subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Two impressive goals by Lionel Messi gave Barcelona a 2-0 victory over Real Madrid, but José Mourinho wanted to talk only about the officiating.
snippet: Two impressive goals by Lionel Messi gave Barcelona a 2-0 victory over Real Madrid, but José Mourinho wanted to talk only about the officiating.
